channel.title: Ggplot on Andrew's Data Science Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ggplot on Andrew's Data Science Blog

item.title: ScatterPlot
item.description:
library(Lahman) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) library(ggiraph) df<-Batting%>% group_by(playerID)%>% summarize(career_HR=sum(HR),career_SO=sum(SO))%>% filter(career_HR>=400) HR_vs_SO<-inner_join(df,Master,by=c("playerID"))%>% select(nameFirst,nameLast,career_HR,career_SO) HR_vs_SO$name<-paste(HR_vs_SO$nameFirst,HR_vs_SO$nameLast) ———————————— g<-ggplot()+ geom_point_interactive(data=HR_vs_SO,aes(x=career_SO,y=career_HR,tooltip=name,data_id=nameLast))+ ggtitle("Career Homeruns vs. Strikeouts for Great Hitters")+ xlab("Career Strikeouts")+ ylab("Career Homeruns") ggiraph(code=print(g),hover_css="fill:white;stroke:black") {"x":{"html":"

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 400
 
 
 500
 
 
 600
 
 
 700
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1000
 
 
 1500
 
 
 2000
 
 
 2500
 
 
 Career Strikeouts
 
 
 Career Homeruns
 
 
 Career Homeruns vs.

item.title: ggplot
item.description:
library(Lahman) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) library(ggiraph) df<-Batting%>% group_by(playerID)%>% summarize(career_HR=sum(HR),career_SO=sum(SO))%>% filter(career_HR>=400) HR_vs_SO<-inner_join(df,Master,by=c("playerID"))%>% select(nameFirst,nameLast,career_HR,career_SO) HR_vs_SO$name<-paste(HR_vs_SO$nameFirst,HR_vs_SO$nameLast) ———————————— g<-ggplot()+ geom_point_interactive(data=HR_vs_SO,aes(x=career_SO,y=career_HR,tooltip=name,data_id=nameLast))+ ggtitle("Career Homeruns vs. Strikeouts for Great Hitters")+ xlab("Career Strikeouts")+ ylab("Career Homeruns") ggiraph(code=print(g),hover_css="fill:white;stroke:black") {"x":{"html":"
